review_text: This course taught me that I'm not ready for PR :) It's worth the money to know what you'll need when you're there.
Though it offered good information, its surface value tips and brief video format didn't match the price of the course.
Great insights into do's and dont's in the PR world!

PR is hard to understand and even harder to master, but Andrea makes it so easy to understand and learn what not to do, and what to do instead. She is very brief, but onto to point in each lesson, so you wonâ€™t lose your focus but will learn what you must. I thank you for this great lesson.
It is succinct but very insightful. Thank you!
As a 30 year PR veteran this course provides a very thorough overview of how to effectively pitch the media and also deal with the media too.  It's very fast moving and fun!  Highly recommended!
